title: -- Spacious 3 Bed -- Great Harvard Location - Back Deck - 8/1
posting_body: ['Apartment Rental Experts', '3+ Bedroom and 1 Bath in Somerville / Harvard Square $3,300', 'Somerville / Harvard Square / Dali', 'Available:', '8/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#178505', 'Apartment Details', 'Reference:', '#178505', 'Bedrooms:', '3+', 'Bath:', '1', 'Location:', 'Somerville/Harvard Square', 'Available:', 'August 01, 2022', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Apartment Summary', 'BIg, big unit on the market right up the street from Harvard Yard.', ' Has big rooms, bathroom renovated a few years ago, super jumbo back deck.', " Can't beat the price or location.", ' The kitchen is being renovated with new cabinets, floor, stove, and dishwasher in summer 2022.', " EZ walk to Harvard -- located near Dali Restaurant and Savenor's Market.", 'Three large bedroom and good sized study (Reference #178505)', 'Contact Information', 'Call:', '617.909.1610', 'Please mention reference #', '178505', '* Availability, fee and monthly rent are subject to change.', ' Please call to verify details.', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
